Title: Antipasto
Writer: Bryan Fuller (developed for television by), Thomas Harris (characters from the book "Red Dragon"), Bryan Fuller, Steve Lightfoot
Actors: Mads Mikkelsen, Hugh Dancy, Caroline Dhavernas, Gillian Anderson
Plot: After the devastating bloodbath at Lecters home Hannibal establishes a new life for himself in Italy along with the company of his own psychiatrist Bedelia.
